articles.description: Neidorff, who died Thursday, led the Clayton-based health insurance company for 26 years, growing it into a behemoth in the managed care industry.
articles.content:
CLAYTON Longtime Centene Corp. leader Michael Neidorff, a pillar of the St. Louis business community, died on Thursday at the age of 79.
Neidorff led the Clayton-based company for 26 years, growing … [+6970 chars]

articles.author: Hannah Sparks
articles.title: 'Dirty Dozen' warning: Fruits and veggies rank on danger list - New York Post
articles.description: The EWG found that 90% of samples taken from most fruits on the list tested positive for at least two kinds of pesticides.
articles.content:
This could make people berry afraid.
